title: isPending​
content: </> Future:isPending() → boolean Polls the Future and returns true if the Future is pending.

title: isReady​
content: </> Future:isReady() → boolean Polls the Future and returns true if the Future is ready.

title: output​
content: </> Future:output() → ...T? If the Future is ready, returns the results ...T. Otherwise, returns nil.
